definition.de:
Benutzt von PeerTube im Video Objekt als 'licence'. Möglicher Wert dort:
{ "identifier": "1", "name": "Attribution" },
{ "identifier": "2", "name": "Attribution - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "3", "name": "Attribution - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "4", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial" },
{ "identifier": "5", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "6", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "7", "name": "Public Domain Dedication" }
siehe auch [schema.org/license](https://schema.org/license)
definition.en:
Used by PeerTube with the Video Object as 'licence'. Possible value there:
{ "identifier": "1", "name": "Attribution" },
{ "identifier": "2", "name": "Attribution - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "3", "name": "Attribution - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "4", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial" },
{ "identifier": "5", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "6", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "7", "name": "Public Domain Dedication" }
see also [schema.org/license](https://schema.org/license)
definition.fr:
Utilisé dans PeerTube avec l'objet vidéo ou 'licence'
{ "identifier": "1", "name": "Attribution" },
{ "identifier": "2", "name": "Attribution - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "3", "name": "Attribution - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "4", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial" },
{ "identifier": "5", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "6", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "7", "name": "Public Domain Dedication" }
voir également [schema.org/license](https://schema.org/license)
definition.es:
Se utiliza en PeerTube con el objeto de vídeo en 'licence'
{ "identifier": "1", "name": "Attribution" },
{ "identifier": "2", "name": "Attribution - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "3", "name": "Attribution - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "4", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial" },
{ "identifier": "5", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - Share Alike" },
{ "identifier": "6", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - No Derivatives" },
{ "identifier": "7", "name": "Public Domain Dedication" }
véase también [schema.org/license](https://schema.org/license)

title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
title.fr: ActivityPub et ses amis - Une ontologie du fediverse
title.es: ActivityPub y sus amigos - Una ontología del fediverso
